title: (Fri Early) Mailbag: Boyfriend Went to A Bikini Car Wash + Amy Defends Her Crown in Easy Trivia + Fun Fact Friday
itunes:title: (Fri Early) Mailbag: Boyfriend Went to A Bikini Car Wash + Amy Defends Her Crown in Easy Trivia + Fun Fact Friday
description:
In the mailbag, a listener is upset after her boyfriend went to get his car cleaned at a bikini car wash, but he says it was all for charity. We play a round of easy trivia where Eddie is closing in on getting the crown back from Amy. Amy shares her 5 Fun Facts including the mysterious conspiracy behind JFK’s brain.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
